prompt: Generate diverse and realistic customer feedback text that expresses negative sentiment. The feedback should convey dissatisfaction, frustration, or disappointment with a product, service, or experience. Include a wide range of contexts such as online shopping, restaurant visits, customer support interactions, app usage, travel experiences, or subscription services. Use varied tones (e.g., angry, sarcastic, disappointed, formal, passive-aggressive) and lengths (from short complaints to detailed critical reviews). Incorporate different perspectives, such as feedback from younger or older customers, or from different cultural backgrounds. Include subtle or nuanced negativity (e.g., mild frustration or polite criticism) alongside strong complaints. Examples could include criticism of poor quality, delays, unhelpful staff, technical issues, misleading advertising, or unpleasant experiences.
response:
I waited over an hour for my food, and when it finally arrived, it was cold and unappetizing.  
I ordered a dress online, but it arrived two sizes too small and the color was completely different than advertised.  
The customer service representative was rude and unhelpful, leaving me more frustrated than before.  
I was really looking forward to my vacation, but the hotel was nothing like the pictures.  
My subscription was supposed to include premium content, but it seems like I'm stuck with the basic package.  
The app keeps crashing, making it nearly impossible to use.  
I can't believe I paid so much for a phone that keeps freezing and the battery drains in no time.  
The food was bland and overpriced; I won’t be returning to this restaurant anytime soon.  
I had to call customer support three times just to get a simple issue resolved.  
The misleading advertisement made me think I was getting a great deal, but it turned out to be a scam.  
I tried to leave a review on their website, but the submission form was broken.  
I expected a quick delivery, but it took over two weeks to receive my order.  
The service was so slow, I almost walked out before my meal arrived.  
I received a defective product, and now I'm stuck waiting for a replacement.  
The staff seemed overwhelmed and disorganized, which made my experience very frustrating.  
I was promised a refund within five days, but it’s been over two weeks with no update.  
The website is difficult to navigate, making it hard to find what I need.  
I felt completely ignored when I raised my concerns to the manager.  
The last update to the app made it more cumbersome to use, not less.  
I was really disappointed by the lack of options on the menu; it felt very limiting.  
My flight was canceled with no explanation, and I was left scrambling to find another one.  
I ordered a coffee, and it tasted burnt and stale; definitely not worth the price.  
The customer loyalty program seemed great, but I never received the rewards I was promised.  
I was shocked at how dirty the restaurant was; it made me lose my appetite.  
I had high hopes for this new gadget, but it hasn’t worked as described at all.  
I thought I was signing up for a free trial, but was charged immediately without warning.  
The staff seemed more interested in chatting among themselves than helping customers.  
I didn’t appreciate how my complaint was brushed off as unimportant.  
The check-in process was chaotic and took way longer than it should have.  
I’ve had nothing but trouble with this service; it’s not worth the headache.  
I feel misled by the marketing; the product is nothing like what I expected.  
The last time I visited, my order was wrong, and the staff didn’t seem to care.  
I was disappointed that the event was poorly organized and lacking in detail.  
The quality of the materials used in this product is very low; I expected better.  
I couldn't even get through to customer service; the line was always busy.  
The hotel room was noisy, and I couldn't sleep at all during my stay.  
I was excited for the concert, but the venue was overcrowded and uncomfortable.  
I found the food to be overpriced for the small portions served.  
It took way too long to receive my package, and the tracking was inaccurate.  
I regret signing up for this app; it’s more trouble than it’s worth.  
The service at the restaurant was subpar; we felt completely neglected.  
I had to explain my issue multiple times before getting any help, which was exhausting.  
The misleading size chart resulted in me receiving shoes that were far too small.  
My experience at the clinic was frustrating; I felt rushed and unheard.  
I won't be recommending this airline after my recent experience; it was disappointing.  
I expected a lot more from this product based on its reviews, but it’s just mediocre.  
The delivery driver was late and unapologetic, which was frustrating.  
The movie was nothing like the trailer promised; I felt let down.  
I was surprised at how unprofessional the staff were; it felt very unwelcoming.  
This online course was not worth the investment; I learned very little.  
I felt that the service was rushed, and my concerns were not adequately addressed.  
The event was poorly advertised, and I was disappointed with the turnout.  
I’ve had to reset my password too many times; this is getting ridiculous.  
The product didn’t live up to the hype; it was underwhelming at best.
